name: Everything Warren Buffett
description: Partnership letters, Berkshire Hathaway letters, annual meeting transcripts, memos, and articles.

name: Berkshire Annual Meetings
description: Berkshire Hathaway annual meeting transcripts starting from 1994.

name: Everything Charlie Munger
description: Annual letters from Blue Chip Stamps, Wesco, and Daily Journal, as well as articles and talks.

name: Walter Schloss
description: Compilation of articles by Walter Schloss.

name: Li Lu
description: Compilation of books, talks, and interviews by Li Lu.

name: Nick Sleep
description: Compilation of Nomad Investment Partnership Letters to Partners from 2001 to 2014.

name: Peter Lynch
description: Peter Lynch's investing articles for Worth Magazine from 1993 to 1999.

name: Constellation Software
description: Letters from Mark Leonard and written Q&A for Constellation Software.

name: Amazon
description: Compilation of Amazon's letters to shareholders.

name: Alphabet (Google)
description: Compilation of Google's letters to shareholders.

name: Jamie Dimon
description: Compilation of letters, annual reports, and investor day presentations related to Jamie Dimon.

name: John Maynard Keynes
description: Compilation of National Mutual Life Assurance letters.

name: Exor
description: Compilation of letters related to John Elkann and Exor.

name: Markel
description: Compilation of letters related to Markel and Tom Gayner as well as interspersed meeting notes.

name: Fairfax
description: Compilation of letters and annual reports for Fairfax, Fairfax India, and Fairfax Africa.
